GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix queue selection for mesh/OCB interfaces

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.207 by commit 444be5a02b77f3b7a8ac9c1a0b074fbb3bd89cd0. For more details please see the references link.
